StringTable.Label: ResearchMission_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Subsidizes a research mission to the outer rim.

StringTable.Label: ResearchMission_RewardAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String: Our research mission has finished, resulting in some valuable new knowledge that we can apply to our ongoing research efforts. We have added 50 tech points towards our next research project!

StringTable.Label: ProductionMission_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Subsidizes a mining mission to the outer rim.

StringTable.Label: ProductionMission_RewardAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String: Our production mission has finished. We have added 100 production towards our planetary project!

StringTable.Label: CreditsMission_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Subsidizes a private venture to unknown places, to find and collect valuable artifacts.

StringTable.Label: CreditsMission_RewardAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String: The treasure hunters report success from their efforts. Some unknown alien artifacts were discovered and sold on the market.

StringTable.Label: SlaveMission_RewardAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String: The thrall seekers report success from their efforts. Some new slaves have been sent back along with our money that they coincidentally were carrying.

StringTable.Label: ExoticResourcesMission_ShortDec
StringTable.String: By contracting with our most knowledgeable traders they claim they will bring back exotic resources.

StringTable.Label: ExoticResourcesMission_RewardAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String: The contract traders have completed their mission and provided the rare resources they found.

StringTable.Label: ResourcesMission_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Scavengers claim they can find some rare resources.

StringTable.Label: ResourcesMission_RewardAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String: The scavengers have completed their mission and provided the rare resources they found.

StringTable.Label: GemTrader_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Subsidizes a private broker who says, for the right price, he can find us exotic Harmony crystals.

StringTable.Label: GemTrader_RewardAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String: The Gem trader was successful in trading Durantium and Promethion for some Harmony crystals.

StringTable.Label: Xylology_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Fund a group of Xylologists who are investigating the evolutionary properties of rare trees. They promise to return with Aurorus seedlings.

StringTable.Label: Xylology_RewardAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String: The Xylologists have returned with seeds that we can use to grow an Aurorus Arboretum.

StringTable.Label: Pilgrims_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Fund a group of pilgrims who wish to spread the word of our wonderful civilization to increase our influence.

StringTable.Label: Pilgrims_RewardAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String: The pilgrims have returned from their long journey spreading our influence far and wide. Each of our planets has increased its influence substantially.

StringTable.Label: HyperSilicateMission_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Subsidize a Hyper Silicates trader who knows the right people from whom to buy some.

StringTable.Label: HyperSilicateMission_RewardAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String: The Scavenger Mission was a success, providing some much-needed Hyper Silicates for our civilization.

StringTable.Label: HeliosOreScavengeMission_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Subsidize a mining group who think they can find Helios Ore on nearby dead worlds.

StringTable.Label: HeliosOreScavengeMission_RewardAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String: The Scavenger Mission was a success, providing some much-needed Helios Ore for our civilization.

StringTable.Label: ArnorSpiceScavangersMission_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Subsidize a mining group who think they can find Arnor Spice on nearby dead worlds.

StringTable.Label: ArnorSpiceScavangersMission_RewardAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String: The Scavenger Mission was a success, providing some much-needed Arnor Spice for our civilization.

StringTable.Label: HeadhunterMission_ShortDec
StringTable.String: An enterprising Recruiter insists, if we pay his expenses, he will head out into the galaxy and find us a new Citizen who will be willing to join our cause.

StringTable.Label: HeadhunterMission_RewardAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String: Our recruiter has returned with a new citizen to join our civilization!

StringTable.Label: SalvageCrewMission_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Subsidize a crew of hardy explorers who are willing to go out and find abandoned ships that can be repaired.

StringTable.Label: SalvageCrewMission_RewardAnomaly_Name
StringTable.String: Our Salvage Crew has found a Ship

StringTable.Label: SalvageCrewMission_RewardAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String: The Salvage crew that we dispatched has found a ship, and have been able to restore to a usable condition.

StringTable.Label: BasicTradeShipMission_RewardAnomaly_Dec
StringTable.String: Our freighter has safely returned home, with a tidy profit!
